pages.text: $(li)The Flute is an item that will let you summon all non sitting pets that are around you.$(br)$(li)You can also right or left click a pet with a Flute to bind the item to said pet.
$(li)A bound Flute will then only summon that specific pet, this time regardless if it's sitting or not only if the pet if it is within 64 blocks to you.
